thread.title: John H, Naperville
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by John H, Naperville

author: John H, Naperville
title: John H, Naperville
text: I shopped a few places for storage not too far from home. The representative at Public Storage was polite, knowledgeable and seemed t want my business. The rate was slightly better than the other place, but the reason I chose Public is the treatment I received. When I asked questions, i received direct, honest answers. The facility is clean, warm and dry, very secure and convenient.
